verses.name: Psalms 78:25
verses.text: Man did eat angels’ food: he sent them meat to the full.

verses.name: Psalms 78:26
verses.text: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven: and by his power he brought in the south wind.

verses.name: Psalms 78:27
verses.text: He rained flesh also upon them as dust, and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:

verses.name: Psalms 78:28
verses.text: And he let it fall in the midst of their camp, round about their habitations.

verses.name: Psalms 78:29
verses.text: So they did eat, and were well filled: for he gave them their own desire;

verses.name: Psalms 78:30
verses.text: They were not estranged from their lust. But while their meat was yet in their mouths,
